QuestData.Title: Flame at Last
QuestData.Description:
Alright, youngling, I've placed all the water elemental essences in this jar for you.
If you just toss it at the big one, it should work. I mean, when has water not worked against fire? It's foolproof.
The heat, uh, isn't good for my joints, so I'll just stay here. I trust you can handle it.
Good luck, young one!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The fire elemental behind all the chaos in the Gardens of Unity.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Concentrated Essence of Water to defeat the Blazing Inferno in the Gardens.
QuestData.RewardText: Incredible! I wasn't sure it was going to work, but I'm glad it did.

Objectives.Objective: Use Watery Elemental Essence on Blazing Inferno
